channel.title: Gavin (Kuan Lun) Chen
channel.description: Recent content on Gavin (Kuan Lun) Chen

item.title: Business Analysis: Coffee Transaction Data
item.description: Analyzed 1.5M+ transaction records to identify customer segments and preferences using RFM and text-based analysis.

item.title: Diabetes Risk Prediction
item.description: Implemented multiple classifiers + evaluation (F2, ROC AUC, threshold tuning), with early stopping and visual comparisons

item.title: Econometrics: Globalization, Education, and Obesity
item.description: Applied panel regression models to study the relationship between globalization, education, and obesity, with robustness checks and economic interpretation.

item.title: Let's Connect!
item.description: <iframe id="JotFormIFrame-260011555353447" title="Let's Connect!" allowtransparency="true" allow="geolocation; microphone; camera; fullscreen; payment" src="https://form.jotform.com/260011555353447" frameborder="0" style="min-width:100%;max-width:100%;height:700px;border:none;" scrolling="no"> </iframe> <script src="https://cdn.jotfor.ms/s/umd/latest/for-form-embed-handler.js"></script> <script> window.jotformEmbedHandler("iframe[id='JotFormIFrame-260011555353447']", "https://form.jotform.com/"); </script>

item.title: Research: Mercedes-Benz EV Transition Strategy
item.description: Analyzed Mercedes-Benz’s EV transition strategy across global production networks, ESG considerations, and localization decisions.

item.title: Research: The Merger and Failure of Daimler-Benz and Chrysler (1997–2008)
item.description: Analyzed one of the most prominent M&A failures to evaluate strategic missteps, integration risks, and how valuation gaps, cultural mismatch, and strategic misalignment led to long-term value destruction.
